trans-unit.source: : If post_type is ‘page’, will attempt to set the page template. On failure, the function will return either a WP_Error or 0, and stop before the final actions are called. trans-unit.target: ：如果post_type为'page'，将尝试设置页面模板。失败时，该函数将返回WP_Error或0，并在调用最终操作之前停止。如果post_type不是'page'，则忽略该参数。您可以通过使用“ _wp_page_template”键调用update_post_meta（）来为非页面设置页面模板。

query_posts() is a way to alter the main query that WordPress uses to display posts. It does this by putting the main query to one side, and replacing it with a new query. To clean up after a call to query_posts, make a call to wp_reset_query(), and the original main query will be restored.
trans-unit.target: query_posts（）是一种更改WordPress用于显示帖子的主要查询的方法。它通过将主查询放在一边，然后用新查询替换它来完成此操作。要在调用query_posts之后进行清理，请调用wp_reset_query（），然后将还原原始的主查询。

trans-unit.source: query_posts() is meant for altering the main loop. It does so by replacing the query used to generate the main loop content. Once you use query_posts(), your post-related global variables and template tags will be altered. Conditional tags that are called after you call query_posts() will also be altered – this may or may not be the intended result.
trans-unit.target: query_posts（）用于更改主循环。它通过替换用于生成主循环内容的查询来实现。一旦使用query_posts（），与帖子相关的全局变量和模板标签将被更改。在调用query_posts（）之后调用的条件标签也将被更改-这可能是也可能不是预期的结果。

trans-unit.source: query_posts() is only one way amongst many to query the database and generate a list of posts. Before deciding to use query_posts(), be sure to understand the drawbacks.
trans-unit.target: query_posts（）只是查询数据库和生成帖子列表的众多方式之一。在决定使用query_posts（）之前，请务必了解缺点。
